00080100.name: CodeValue
00080100.description: The identifier of the Coded Entry. Required if â‰¤16 chars and not a URN or URL.

00080102.name: CodingSchemeDesignator
00080102.description: The identifier of the Coding Scheme in which the Coded Entry is defined. Required if Code Value or Long Code Value is present.

00080103.name: CodingSchemeVersion
00080103.description: Version of the Coding Scheme, required if Designator is not unambiguous.

00080104.name: CodeMeaning
00080104.description: Text that conveys the meaning of the Coded Entry.

00080119.name: LongCodeValue
00080119.description: Used when Code Value is not present and value is not a URN or URL.

00080120.name: URNCodeValue
00080120.description: Used when Code Value is not present and value is a URN or URL.

0008010F.name: ContextIdentifier
0008010F.description: Identifier of the Context Group from which the Coded Entry was selected.

00080117.name: ContextUID
00080117.description: Unique identifier of the Context Group.

00080105.name: MappingResource
00080105.description: Identifier of the Mapping Resource that defines the Context Group. Required if Context Identifier is present.

00080118.name: MappingResourceUID
00080118.description: UID of the Mapping Resource that defines the Context Group.

00080122.name: MappingResourceName
00080122.description: Name of the Mapping Resource that defines the Context Group.

00080106.name: ContextGroupVersion
00080106.description: Version of the Context Group. Required if Context Identifier is present.

0008010B.name: ContextGroupExtensionFlag
0008010B.description: Indicates whether the code is from a private extension of the Context Group. Enumerated Values: Y, N.

00080107.name: ContextGroupLocalVersion
00080107.description: Implementation-specific version of a Context Group with private extensions. Required if Extension Flag is 'Y'.

0008010D.name: ContextGroupExtensionCreatorUID
0008010D.description: UID of the person/organization who created the Context Group extension. Required if Extension Flag is 'Y'.
